250500.name: General: Vandalism
250500.description: Select a **Combat** or **Elite** domain to immediately get the rewards of the domain and change it to a **Blank** domain (The effects of Curios do not activate simultaneously)

250501.name: Domain: Oblivion
250501.description: Select an **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal**, or **Reward** Domain. Obtain **1[i]** Blessing(s) for every Occurrence in the domain, and turn it into **Blank** Domain

250502.name: Domain: Emotion
250502.description: After the current movement, immediately turn all adjacent domains to the right of the current domain (excluding **Boss** and **Blank**) into **Blank** Domains. For each domain changed, gain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments and **2[i]** random Blessing(s)

250503.name: General: Imitation
250503.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**) and turn it into **Combat** Domain

250504.name: Domain: Creation
250504.description: Immediately turn a random domain (excluding **Boss**) into **Occurrence** Domain or **Occurrence: Abnormal** Domain

250505.name: Domain: Self
250505.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**). Immediately copy the current domain onto the selected domain and apply the **Knowledge** effect

250506.name: General: Counteract
250506.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**). Immediately copy the selected domain onto an adjacent domain (excluding **Boss**) and apply the **Knowledge** effect

250507.name: Domain: Intuition
250507.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**) and randomly reshuffle all domains of that type in the current plane, with each reshuffle granting **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250508.name: General: Perception
250508.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**) and turn **1[i]** random adjacent domain(s) into the same type as the selected domain

250509.name: General: Inspiration
250509.description: Select 1 domain, copy the selected domain to **1[i]** random location(s) on the current plane, and apply **Knowledge** to it (excluding **Boss**)

250510.name: Domain: Classification
250510.description: Select 1 **Combat** Domain (excluding **Boss**) and turn **1[i]** random adjacent domain(s) into **Combat** Domain

250511.name: General: Confirmation
250511.description: Immediately turn 1 random **Elite** Domain or **Adventure** Domain into a Reward Domain

250512.name: Domain: Association
250512.description: Select 1 **Combat** or **Elite** Domain and switch it with a random domain adjacent to the current domain

250513.name: Beacon: Imagination
250513.description: Select 1 **Combat**, **Elite**, **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal**, or **Reward** Domain and apply a random beacon to it. Then, switch it with a random domain adjacent to the current domain

250515.name: Domain: Experience
250515.description: Select 1 **Combat** domain with beacon. Immediately obtain the reward in the domain and change it into **Blank** Domain (The effects of Curios do not activate simultaneously)

250516.name: General: Dialectics
250516.description: Immediately copy the current domain to **1[i]** random location(s) on the current plane and apply **Knowledge** to it (excluding **Boss**)

250517.name: General: Duel
250517.description: For every 1 domain on the current plane that contains a **Blessing Trotter** or **Curio Trotter** beacon, immediately gain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments. These domains then all swap their positions with a random adjacent domain.

250518.name: Beacon: Abstraction
250518.description: Immediately generates **1[i]** random beacon(s) on the current plane

250521.name: General: Sensibility
250521.description: Immediately generates **1[i]** **Blessing Trotter** or **Curio Trotter** beacon(s) in random **Combat** or **Elite** domain(s)

250522.name: Knowledge: Evidence
250522.description: Immediately generates **1[i]** random beacon(s) in random domain(s) with **Knowledge**

250523.name: General: Deduction
250523.description: Immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1[i]** random domain(s) that don't yet have **Knowledge** on this plane

250524.name: General: Diffusion
250524.description: Immediately generates **1[i]** random beacon(s) in random domain(s) on this plane (This effect will not be generated again after taking effect for 1 time on this plane)

250525.name: Knowledge: Principle
250525.description: Immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1[i]** domain(s) adjacent to each domain with **Knowledge** on this plane

250526.name: Knowledge: Reflection
250526.description: Immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1[i]** random domain(s) that don't yet have **Knowledge** on this plane

250529.name: Knowledge: Arithmetic Progression
250529.description: Select 1 domain with **Knowledge** and apply **Knowledge** to all its adjacent domains

250530.name: Knowledge: Protectiveness
250530.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1[i]** random domain(s) that are about to collapse.

250531.name: General: Arithmetic
250531.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1[i]** random domain(s) adjacent to the domain where characters are located

250532.name: General: Exponential Explosion
250532.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to all domains adjacent to the domain where characters are located

250533.name: Knowledge: Pre-sale
250533.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to all domains that are about to collapse

250534.name: Knowledge: Wager
250534.description: For every type of domain that has **Knowledge** on the current plane, immediately obtain **1[i]** random Blessing(s) (A maximum of **2[i]** random Blessings can be obtained)

250536.name: Domain: Challenge
250536.description: When entering a **Combat** or **Elite** domain during the current movement, obtain **1[i]** Blessing(s)

250537.name: Domain: Cost
250537.description: When entering an **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal**, or **Reward** domains during the current movement, increase the countdown by **1[i]**

250538.name: General: Olfactory
250538.description: During the current movement, when entering a domain of the same type as the one where characters are currently in, receive Blessings **1[i]** times

250539.name: General: Justice
250539.description: When entering a domain with **Knowledge** during this movement, receive **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments. When entering a domain with a beacon during this movement, receive Blessings **2[i]** times

250540.name: Knowledge: Extreme
250540.description: When entering a domain with **Knowledge** during this movement, apply **Knowledge** to **1[i]** random domains on the current plane

250541.name: Beacon: Intimacy
250541.description: When entering a domain with a beacon during this movement, generate **1[i]** **Blessing Trotter** or **Curio Trotter** beacon(s) on the current plane

250542.name: Beacon: Prey
250542.description: During this movement, can move to a domain in the closest column that contains either a **Blessing Trotter** beacon or **Curio Trotter** beacon. Rewards gained from defeating Trotters is doubled

250545.name: General: Observation
250545.description: Can move to any domain in the next 3 columns during the current movement

250546.name: Knowledge: Grandiose Fantasy
250546.description: Can move to any domain with **Knowledge** during the current movement

250547.name: Beacon: Infinity
250547.description: Can move to any domain with a beacon during the current movement

250550.name: General: Adventure Preference
250550.description: Select 1 **Elite** or **Reward** Domain and turn it into an **Adventure** Domain

250551.name: Beacon: Replacement
250551.description: Select 1 domain with a beacon and immediately swap its beacon into a different type of beacon, then receive 1 random Blessing

250552.name: Domain: Sell
250552.description: After the current movement, for every domain that collapses, immediately obtains **1[i]** Cosmic Fragment(s)

250553.name: Beacon: Geometry
250553.description: For every type of beacon that exists on the current plane, immediately obtain 1 random Blessing (A maximum of **1[i]** random Blessings can be obtained)

250555.name: Beacon: Shuffle
250555.description: Immediately change all beacons on the current Plane into random beacons, then generate 1 random beacon

250556.name: Knowledge: Winning Hand
250556.description: Immediately turn 1 random domain with **Knowledge** into an **Adventure** Domain (excluding **Boss** Domains)

250557.name: General: Pawn Shop
250557.description: Discard Curio 1 time and obtain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments (This will not take effect when no Curios can be discarded)

250560.name: Heterogeneity: Biphasic
250560.description: Obtain 1 Curio and 1 random Negative Curio (This effect will not be generated again after taking effect for 1 time on this plane)

250561.name: Heterogeneity: Reforge
250561.description: Discard 1 Curio and obtain it again

250562.name: Heterogeneity: Consumerism
250562.description: Immediately turn **1[i]** random domain(s) into **Transaction** Domain(s) (excluding **Boss**)

250563.name: Heterogeneity: Interest
250563.description: When entering **Transaction** Domain during this movement, obtain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250564.name: Heterogeneity: Alienation
250564.description: Select 1 **Elite**, **Adventure**, or **Reward** Domain and turn it into a **Transaction** Domain, then obtain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250565.name: Heterogeneity: Treasure
250565.description: For every Curio that you own, immediately obtain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250566.name: Heterogeneity: Inflation
250566.description: For the current movement, can move to a **Transaction** Domain in the closest column. The cost of items in that domain increases by **1[i]%**, however both the Curio Store and the Blessing Store will contain 1 random free item

250567.name: General: Time Trade
250567.description: Consume 1 point of countdown or increase Disruption level by 1 to instantly get **1[i]** Cosmic Fragment(s)

250569.name: General: Hesitation
250569.description: Obtain 1 random Negative Curio and add 1 point in the countdown (This will not take effect when no Negative Curios can be obtained)

250570.name: General: Phaseless
250570.description: Discard Curio 1 time and add **1[i]** point(s) in the countdown (This will not take effect when no Curios can be discarded)

250571.name: General: Colorless
250571.description: Select 1 **Reward** or **Adventure** Domain, turn it into a **Blank** Domain, and gain **1[i]** point(s) in the countdown

250572.name: Knowledge: Curve
250572.description: Select 1 domain with **Knowledge** and apply **Knowledge** to **1[i]** of its random adjacent domains

250573.name: General: Entropy
250573.description: Select 1 domain and apply **Knowledge** to it

250576.name: Knowledge: Subtraction
250576.description: Select 1 domain. Make it and all its adjacent domains lose **Knowledge**. For every **Knowledge** lost in this way, receive **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250577.name: General: Topology
250577.description: For every domain on the current plane that has **Knowledge**, immediately obtain **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250578.name: Knowledge: Transcendence
250578.description: Select 1 domain with **Knowledge**, turn it into a **Blank** Domain with **Knowledge**, and obtain Blessings 1 time (excluding **Blank** and **Boss** domains)

250579.name: General Buff: Shield
250579.description: When entering combat during the current movement, characters gain a Shield equal to **1[i]%** of their Max HP for **2[i]** turns. At the beginning of each turn, this Shield additionally increases by **3[i]%** of the affected ally's Max HP.

250580.name: General Buff: Fragility
250580.description: When entering combat this time, reduce all enemies' Effect RES by **1[i]%** and Control RES by **2[i]%** for **3[i]** turns.

250581.name: General Buff: Detonation
250581.description: When entering combat in this movement, characters using their Basic ATK will deal additional DMG to enemies with DoT effects. For every 1 turn (up to **2[i]** turns) of the target's DoT duration, deals extra DMG equal to **1[i]%** of the original DMG and removes the DoT effect. This effect lasts for **3[i]** turn(s)

250582.name: General Buff: Preference
250582.description: When entering combat in this movement, every time allies restore HP, they will restore additional HP equal to **1[i]%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s)

250583.name: General Buff: Dexterity
250583.description: When entering combat in this movement, increase the SPD of all allies by **1[i]%** for **2[i]** turn(s).

250584.name: General Buff: Baseline
250584.description: When entering combat in this movement, allies will not receive DMG exceeding **1[i]%** of their Max HP in a single attack. This effect lasts for **2[i]** turn(s), and can be triggered for up to 1 time per each turn.

250585.name: General Buff: Vengeance
250585.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' follow-up attacks ignore **1[i]%** of the target's DEF for **2[i]** turn(s)

250586.name: General Buff: Rejuvenation
250586.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every **1[i]** Skill Point(s) allies have consumed, they recover 1 Skill Point, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s)

250587.name: General Buff: Initiative
250587.description: When entering combat in this movement, allies casting their Ultimate will Advance their action Forward by **1[i]%**. This effect can only be triggered once for every **2[i]** turn(s), lasting for **3[i]** turn(s)

250588.name: General Buff: Investment
250588.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every **100** Cosmic Fragments in possession, characters using attacks will deal Additional DMG equal to **1[i]%** of their ATK to the attacked enemy target, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s)

250589.name: General Buff: Martyrdom
250589.description: When entering combat in this movement, at the start of the enemy target's turn, the enemy target will consume HP equal to **1[i]%** of their Max HP if their current HP is **50%** of their Max HP or higher. This effect lasts for **2[i]** turn(s)

250590.name: General Buff: Law
250590.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every domain that has **Knowledge** on the current plane, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to **1[i]%** of their respective Max HP, not exceeding **2[i]%** of their Max HP

250591.name: General Buff: Pattern
250591.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' ATK increases by **1[i]%**. For every Blessing owned, increases ATK by an additional **2[i]%**, lasting for **3[i]** turn(s)

250592.name: General Buff: Secret Box
250592.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' Max HP increases by **1[i]%**. For every Blessing owned, increases Max HP by an additional **2[i]%**, lasting for **3[i]** turn(s)

250594.name: General: Attention
250594.description: Immediately generates **1[i]** **Double** or **Choice** Beacon(s) in **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal** or **Reward** domains

250595.name: General: Erasure
250595.description: Choose a domain with any number of beacons in it and remove all beacons in it, then receive **1[i]** Cosmic Fragments

250596.name: Domain: Social
250596.description: You may move to the nearest **Elite** or **Reward** domain in this movement
